很难想象这是10年前的游戏，太令人着迷了——我是说G姐的声音。言归正传，两个简单的传送门的使用就完美地将这游戏的核心玩法发挥到淋漓精致的地步，不得不令人惊叹，代入感很强，游玩体验极佳。

If you enjoyed Portal, Portal 2 will CERTAINLY be a big hit for you! Portal 2 has all of Portal's puzzle challenge while introducing you to more characters and witty humor. I instantly was enamored by the beauty of the game-- from lovable character personalities to even more puzzle mechanics and areas to explore, Portal 2 definitely is a worthy successor to the original game.

Oh, and if you're one who prefers to solve things with friends, I'd say the co-op mode is definitely a fun thing to try out!
I give it a good review because it let me shoot holes in the walls and go through them.

There are few things more wonderful than the process of getting into the rules of a universe, learning it all towards a "neo like" matrix moment. This game, including its predecessor, allows for such a thing to happen to you.

... until you go co-op, and it presents yet another wonderful opportunity.

You will not regret playing this game.

Portal 2 is a masterpiece of a game.

First, about Portal 1. I had been meaning to try the Portal series and when I finally purchased Portal 1, I loved it. The puzzles were challenging and the dialogue was funny, GLaDOS's character was just amazing, especially as she changed at then end when you-know-what happened, it was beautiful. I enjoyed every second of playing.

Now about Portal 2. I thought that Portal 1 was amazing and when I bought Portal 2 a few months later, I was totally excited to begin playing, and the game did not disappoint at all. The gameplay, visuals, and characters are just outstanding and I was thrilled. There's no doubt that Portal 2 is way better than it's prequel, though Portal 1 is still good. Wheatley and GLaDOS (now fully in control over herself) are just some unbelievable characters that I absolutely adore. 
At this time that I am posting this review, I have 51 hours in and have played through the game multiple times, and will be playing so much more (especially considering I haven't even started on co-op mode!) This game is unbelievable and you will NOT regret playing this.
我是傻逼

Игра мне понравилась, как одиночный режим, так и кооператив. Вы можете полностью ощутить атмосферу и возможно немного задумаетесь. Вам придется приспосабливаться к обстановке и подстраивать её под себя, это, наверное, больше всего мне понравилось. Сюжет весьма интересен, меня сильно удивил + концовка. Но если вы думаете, что пройдя одиночку вы осилите и кооператив, то спешу вас огорчить, он сложнее, но на то вас и двое. Надеюсь на 3 часть данного шедевра!
